component.title: REST
component.description: The rest component is used for either hosting REST services (consumer) or calling external REST services (producer).
component.label: core,rest

componentName.description: The Camel Rest component to use for the REST transport such as restlet spark-rest. If no component has been explicit configured then Camel will lookup if there is a Camel component that integrates with the Rest DSL or if a org.apache.camel.spi.RestConsumerFactory (consumer) or org.apache.camel.spi.RestProducerFactory (producer) is registered in the registry. If either one is found then that is being used.

apiDoc.description: The swagger api doc resource to use. The resource is loaded from classpath by default and must be in JSon format.

host.description: Host and port of HTTP service to use (override host in swagger schema)

componentName.label: common
componentName.description: The Camel Rest component to use for the REST transport such as restlet spark-rest. If no component has been explicit configured then Camel will lookup if there is a Camel component that integrates with the Rest DSL or if a org.apache.camel.spi.RestConsumerFactory is registered in the registry. If either one is found then that is being used.

consumes.label: common
consumes.description: Media type such as: 'text/xml' or 'application/json' this REST service accepts. By default we accept all kinds of types.

inType.label: common
inType.description: To declare the incoming POJO binding type as a FQN class name

outType.label: common
outType.description: To declare the outgoing POJO binding type as a FQN class name

produces.label: common
produces.description: Media type such as: 'text/xml' or 'application/json' this REST service returns.

routeId.label: common
routeId.description: Name of the route this REST services creates

bridgeErrorHandler.label: consumer
bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages or the likes will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions that will be logged at WARN/ERROR level and ignored.

description.label: consumer
description.description: Human description to document this REST service

exceptionHandler.label: consumer,advanced
exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this options is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions that will be logged at WARN/ERROR level and ignored.

exchangePattern.label: consumer,advanced
exchangePattern.description: Sets the default exchange pattern when creating an exchange.

apiDoc.label: producer
apiDoc.description: The swagger api doc resource to use. The resource is loaded from classpath by default and must be in JSon format.

host.label: producer
host.description: Host and port of HTTP service to use (override host in swagger schema)

queryParameters.label: producer
queryParameters.description: Query parameters for the HTTP service to call

synchronous.label: advanced
synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).
